string-array.name: quotes
string-array.item: Each act of kindness changes the world.
We weave the fabric of life with each heartbeat.
We paint with our heart onto the canvas of life.

resources.string: The Love Foundation is a global nonprofit organization with the mission of inspiring people to love unconditionally. Our vision is to assist people by building a practical foundation and understanding of unconditional love within individuals and society as a whole. \n\nOur programs further the awareness and application of unconditional love through education, research, and charity. Our intention is to explore a variety of creative activities and presentations that enhance unity and self-conscious expression while promoting love and respect to all aspects of life.
We thank you for your kind support. \n100% of your contributions go to supporting our programs.\n
